text: Can you help me open a new bank account?
Sure, I can help you with that. What account identifier would you like to use?
Ok, great. What password would you like to use for your new account?
And finally, what is your name?
Alright, I will use your inputs to open a new account for you. Please wait a moment while I process your request.
Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created. Is there anything else I can do for you?
